description: This file defines an API endpoint using FastAPI for retrieving a dashboard summary, aggregating user data, usage, images, and subscriptions related to a user.

classes.name: DashboardSummary
classes.description: Schema representing the aggregated dashboard data including user info, usage stats, images, and subscriptions.

classes.name: ImageOut
classes.description: Schema for image data exposed in the API response.

classes.name: SubscriptionOut
classes.description: Schema for subscription data exposed in the API response.

classes.name: UsageSummary
classes.description: Schema summarizing usage statistics such as uploads, edits, and trial remaining time.

classes.name: UserOut
classes.description: Schema representing user information in responses.

methods.name: dashboard_summary(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: FastAPI endpoint handler returning a dashboard summary including user info, usage, recent images, and subscriptions.

ctags.name: dashboard_summary
ctags.pattern: /^async def dashboard_summary(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current/
